We are not currently looking for applications, as our recruitment process is over and our team for the FY 21-22 season is already finalized, but the process will begin again in April or May. In the meantime, we encourage everyone interested in joining the team to dive deeper into the exciting field of STEM and robotics!

Our Recruitment Process

  • Step 1: Apply

    Fill out a Google Form to tell us why we should pick you for the team.

  • Step 2: Interview

    Based on your form responses, the team will choose a few candidates who they want to interview. There will also be assignments to work on after the interview, similar to what the team actually does.

  • Step 3: Trial

    If we feel like you would be a good fit for the team, you will serve a two-week trial, where you will act as an honorary member and work on projects to learn about robotics. After the trial, we will let you know if you have been selected for the team.

Traits of a

Team Member

  • Dedication and Passion – joins the team because they are interested in it
  • Time Commitment – at least 4 hrs/week and available during summer
  • Team Player – works well with others and is able to effectively communicate their ideas
  • Reliable – always finishes assignments in time or within the due date
  • Documentation – is able to effectively document learning, a vital aspect of the team
  • Bonus: Experience with robotics, though it is not mandatory as we train new members, improves your chances of getting selected
